properties.description: This space is open to all, during winter months, Wednesday - Sunday 12 noon til 11pm. The last Friday of every month is the Coffee Morning & Book Swap with free Tea & Coffee provided by the Co-op Priorslee from 11am-1pm. Bi-weekly Knit & Natter sessions are also on Wednesdays from 11am - 1pm again with free Tea & Coffee provided by the Co-op Priorslee. We work with the Community to hold these sessions supporting the Warm Welcome Spaces. We also hold a Charity Pub Quiz and Charity Bingo events.
properties.title: The Lion Priorslee
